Uses of Class
org.apache.batik.svggen.DOMTreeManager

Packages that use DOMTreeManager
org.apache.batik.svggen Provides an API on top of the AbstractGraphics2D to translate Java 2D primitives into the SVG format. 
 

Uses of DOMTreeManager in org.apache.batik.svggen
 

Fields in org.apache.batik.svggen declared as DOMTreeManager
protected  DOMTreeManager SVGGraphics2D.domTreeManager
          The DOMTreeManager manages the process of creating and growing the SVG tree.
protected  DOMTreeManager DOMGroupManager.domTreeManager
          DOMTreeManager that this group manager cooperates with
